channel.title: Trusted-Publishing on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Trusted-Publishing on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: npm bulk trusted publishing config and script security now generally available
item.description:
npm CLI v11.10.0+ adds bulk management for OIDC trusted publishing configurations and makes a script security feature generally available.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: New Trusted Publishing enhances security on NuGet.org
item.description:
Microsoft announced Trusted Publishing on NuGet.org, a new, safer way to publish packages that uses short-lived tokens instead of long-lived API keys to enhance security.

  • Source: .NET
